entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of drizzle beginning overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
